languages.text: {n}Клеменциа растерянно откашливается.{/n} "Я... простите краткость и неловкость моих слов, Ваша Светлость... право, ситуация... и обстоятельства..." {n}Собравшись, Клеменциа начинает чеканить.{/n} "О великий Вольный Торговец, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора, предержатель{mf||ница} священного Патента, отправитель{mf||ница} воли Его! Единожды волей вашей ныне сохранили мы, черви, в грязи прозябающие, свои никчемные жизни, не стоящие и единого удара сердца вашего!"

{n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа растерянно откашливается.{/n} "Я... простите краткость и неловкость моих слов, Ваша Светлость... право, ситуация... и обстоятельства..." {n}Собравшись, Клеменциа начинает чеканить.{/n} "О великий Вольный Торговец, помазанни{mf|к|ца} Бога-Императора, предержатель{mf||ница} священного Патента, отправитель{mf||ница} воли Его! Единожды волей вашей ныне сохранили мы, черви, в грязи прозябающие, свои никчемные жизни, не стоящие и единого удара сердца вашего!"

On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, worth not a single beat of your heart!"

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアは一瞬言葉を失ったあと、軽く咳払いをした。{/n}「こ…言葉が足らず申し訳ございません、陛下…あまりに悲惨な状況だったので…」{n}彼女は気を取り直し、しっかりと声を上げた。{/n}「偉大なる自由開拓者様、神帝陛下が聖別されし聖なる令状の持ち主、神の意志を伝えるお方よ！陛下の心臓の一拍にも満たない価値しか持たぬ我らがごとき虫けらの命は、あなたのご意志により救われました！」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアは一瞬言葉を失ったあと、軽く咳払いをした。{/n}「こ…言葉が足らず申し訳ございません、陛下…あまりに悲惨な状況だったので…」{n}彼女は気を取り直し、しっかりと声を上げた。{/n}「偉大なる自由開拓者様、神帝陛下が聖別されし聖なる令状の持ち主、神の意志を伝えるお方よ！陛下の心臓の一拍にも満たない価値しか持たぬ我らがごとき虫けらの命は、あなたのご意志により救われました！」

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅有些不知所措地清了清嗓子。{/n}“我……请原谅我以如此简短、笨拙的方式向您表达谢意，大人……只是现在这个情况……与形势……”{n}她收敛心神，调整好状态，然后以坚定无比的口吻开了口。{/n}“啊！伟大的行商浪人，神皇的使徒，授状的持有者，神圣意志的信使！在这危难时刻，感恩您保佑这片尘埃中的蠕虫得以苟全性命，尽管我们这些卑贱的性命加在一起，都不及您的一次心跳尊贵！”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅有些不知所措地清了清嗓子。{/n}“我……请原谅我以如此简短、笨拙的方式向您表达谢意，大人……只是现在这个情况……与形势……”{n}她收敛心神，调整好状态，然后以坚定无比的口吻开了口。{/n}“啊！伟大的行商浪人，神皇的使徒，许可证的持有者，神圣意志的信使！在这危难时刻，感恩您保佑这片尘埃中的蠕虫得以苟全性命，尽管我们这些卑贱的性命加在一起，都不及您的一次心跳尊贵！”

languages.text: {n}Clementia carraspea, descolocada momentáneamente.{/n} «Yo... le ruego que perdone la torpeza y la brevedad de mis palabras, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Es solo que dada la situación... y las circunstancias...». {n}Recupera la compostura y continúa con firmeza:{/n} «¡Oh, gran Comerciante Independiente, ungid{mf|o|a} del Dios Emperador, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, ejecutor{mf||a} de su voluntad! En este día, es solo por vuestra intervención que nosotros, miserables gusanos, hemos conservado nuestras insignificantes vidas, ¡cuyo valor combinado es inferior a un solo latido de vuestro corazón!».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia carraspea, descolocada momentáneamente.{/n} «Yo... le ruego que perdone la torpeza y la brevedad de mis palabras, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Es solo que dada la situación... y las circunstancias...». {n}Recupera la compostura y continúa con firmeza:{/n} «¡Oh, gran Comerciante Independiente, ungid{mf|o|a} del Dios Emperador, portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente, ejecutor{mf||a} de su voluntad! En este día, es solo por vuestra intervención que nosotros, miserables gusanos, hemos conservado nuestras insignificantes vidas, ¡cuyo valor combinado es inferior a un solo latido de vuestro corazón!».

languages.text: {n}Quelque peu déstabilisée, Clémentia se racle la gorge, avant de reprendre :{/n} « Veuillez pardonner ma concision et mes mots mal choisis, Votre Seigneurie... Mais la situation... et les circonstances ont fait que... » {n}Elle se ressaisit et continue d'une voix plus assurée :{/n} « Ô, noble {mf|libre-marchand, élu|libre-marchande, élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée, {mf|porteur|porteuse} de Sa Volonté ! En ce jour et par votre volonté, nous, misérables vermines, jouissons encore de nos vies médiocres qui ne valent pourtant pas le moindre battement de votre cœur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque peu déstabilisée, Clémentia se racle la gorge, avant de reprendre :{/n} « Veuillez pardonner ma concision et mes mots mal choisis, Votre Seigneurie... Mais la situation... et les circonstances ont fait que... » {n}Elle se ressaisit et continue d'une voix plus assurée :{/n} « Ô, noble {mf|libre-marchand, élu|libre-marchande, élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu, {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée, {mf|porteur|porteuse} de Sa Volonté ! En ce jour et par votre volonté, nous, misérables vermines, jouissons encore de nos vies médiocres qui ne valent pourtant pas le moindre battement de votre cœur ! »

languages.text: {n}Clementia räuspert sich, augenscheinlich verwirrt.{/n} "Ich ... bitte verzeiht die Kürze und Ungeschicktheit meiner Worte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Es ist nur, die Situation ... und die Umstände ..." {n}Sie fängt sich und beginnt mit fester Stimme:{/n} "O {mf|großer Freihändler, Gesalbter des Gottimperators, Träger des heiligen Handelsbriefs, Erfüller Seines Willens|große Freihändlerin, Gesalbte des Gottimperators, Trägerin des heiligen Handelsbriefs, Erfüllerin Seines Willens}! Am heutigen Tag haben wir in der Erde beheimatete Würmer ausschließlich dank Eures Willens unser Leben behalten, obgleich es weniger wert ist als ein einziger Schlag Eures Herzens!"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia räuspert sich, augenscheinlich verwirrt.{/n} "Ich ... bitte verzeiht die Kürze und Ungeschicktheit meiner Worte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Es ist nur, die Situation ... und die Umstände ..." {n}Sie fängt sich und beginnt mit fester Stimme:{/n} "O {mf|großer Freihändler, Gesalbter des Gottimperators, Träger des heiligen Handelsbriefs, Erfüller Seines Willens|große Freihändlerin, Gesalbte des Gottimperators, Trägerin des heiligen Handelsbriefs, Erfüllerin Seines Willens}! Am heutigen Tag haben wir in der Erde beheimatete Würmer ausschließlich dank Eures Willens unser Leben behalten, obgleich es weniger wert ist als ein einziger Schlag Eures Herzens!"

languages.text: {n}Clementia boğazını temizliyor, bir an için afallıyor.{/n} "Ben... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sözlerimin noksanlığını ve aksaklığını bağışlayın... Bu durum... Tüm bu olanlar..." {n}Kendini toparlayıp düzgünce baştan başlıyor.{/n} "Ey yüce Hür Tacir, Tanrı İmparator'un kutsanmışı, Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin hamili, O'nun yeryüzündeki gölgesi! Bugün, yalnız sizin iradenizle değersiz canlarımız bağışlandı. Öyle ki nabzınızın tek atışı dahi bizim canımızdan değerlidir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia clears her throat, momentarily at a loss.{/n} "I... please forgive the brevity and clumsiness of my words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... It's just, the situation... and the circumstances..." {n}She recomposes herself and begins firmly and steadily,{/n} "O great Rogue Trader, the God-Emperor's anointed, bearer of the sacred Warrant, deliverer of His will! On this day, solely by your will, we, dirt-dwelling worms, have been left our lives, though their worth is less than a single beat of your heart!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia boğazını temizliyor, bir an için afallıyor.{/n} “Ben... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sözlerimin noksanlığını ve aksaklığını bağışlayın... Bu durum... Tüm bu olanlar..." {n}Kendini toparlayıp düzgün bir şekilde baştan başlıyor.{/n} "Ey yüce Hür Tacir, Tanrı İmparator'un seçilmişi, Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin taşıyıcısı, O’nun yeryüzündeki gölgesi! Bugün, yalnız sizin iradenizle değersiz canlarımız bağışlandı. Öyle ki nabzınızın tek atışı dahi bizim canımızdan değerlidir!"
